snippet: A new group of militant Irish nationalists calling themselves “the I.R.A.” has claimed responsibility for killing a prison officer in Northern Ireland on Nov. 1.
abstract: New group of militant Irish nationalists calling itself legitimate successor of disbanded Irish Republican Army claims responsibility for killing prison officer in Northern Ireland on November 1.
lead_paragraph: A new group of militant Irish nationalists calling themselves “the I.R.A.” has claimed responsibility for killing a prison officer in Northern Ireland on Nov. 1.

headline.main: Northern Ireland: Group Says It Killed Prison Officer
headline.print_headline: Northern Ireland: Group Says It Killed Prison Officer
